text: This is a list of World Heritage Sites in North Macedonia. ==Properties on the World Heritage List== There is currently one property in North Macedonia on the World Heritage List.North Macedonia - UNESCO World Heritage Centre Image Name Location Type (criteria) Date Number Natural and Cultural Heritage of the Ohrid region Ohrid Municipality, Southwestern statistical region Mixed (i, iii, iv, vii) 1979, 1980 99 ==References== Category:North Macedonia *North Macedonia North Macedonia Category:Europe-related lists
